backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and an admin-controlled image gallery with upload, update, delete, and reorder operations secured by authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend features, related files, components, and test mappings for the project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including components, hooks, assets, and configuration.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining how to build and deploy the project canister to the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining global styles and a warm industrial color palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, icons, and mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application with navigation, gallery slider, service sections, admin entry, share link utilities, and Internet Computer data fetching.
frontend/src/components/AdminGalleryPane: Admin UI enabling authenticated admins to upload, delete, and reorder gallery images with Internet Identity login and React Query actions.
frontend/src/components/GallerySlider.ts: Image slider component with swipe, autoâ€‘advance, navigation buttons, and metadata overlay.
frontend/src/components/SafeImage.tsx: Image wrapper that handles load errors, fallbacks, and optional hidden display on failure.
frontend/src/config/shareLink.ts: Builds a public canister share URL and provides a helper to copy it to the clipboard.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login/logout handling, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for gallery image fetching and admin image operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining a warm industrial color palette with dark mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including session-backed storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state, existing features, and pending requests for a homepage image slider and admin-only image management.
